unnormalised: Okay, here’s a Quora post about training regimens in sports, targeting the specified criteria:
normalised: what are some effective training regimens that you have followed and seen results from

unnormalised: **What are some effective training regimens that you have followed and seen results from?**

normalised: been thinking a lot about training lately especially with the I P L season around the corner what kind of training regimens have you personally found super effective i am especially curious about routines that work for endurance sports maybe something that could help me prepare for the Mumbai Marathon next year

unnormalised: Been thinking a lot about training lately, especially with the IPL season around the corner. What kind of training regimens have you personally found super effective? I'm especially curious about routines that work for endurance sports, maybe something that could help me prepare for the Mumbai Marathon next year.
normalised: for instance I remember a friend Rohan religiously following a five times five strength training program he picked up from a YouTube video and he bulked up like crazy in just three months he was hitting the gym every morning at zero six hundred hours before his college classes at I I T Bombay

unnormalised: For instance, I remember a friend, Rohan, religiously following a 5x5 strength training program he picked up from a YouTube video, and he bulked up like crazy in just 3 months. He was hitting the gym every morning at 06:00 hrs before his college classes at IIT Bombay.
normalised: personally I had decent success with a split routine focused on different muscle groups each day it involved a lot of swimming at the local pool and some light jogging around Marine Drive the key I think was consistency and gradually increasing the intensity I aimed for at least three kilometer runs three times a week

unnormalised: Personally, I had decent success with a split routine focused on different muscle groups each day. It involved a lot of swimming at the local pool and some light jogging around Marine Drive. The key, I think, was consistency and gradually increasing the intensity. I aimed for at least 3 km runs, 3 times a week.
normalised: also how important is nutrition alongside these regimens my mom keeps telling me to eat my ghee and chapatis but i am not sure if it is the best fuel for optimal performance I once tried a purely vegetarian diet for a month leading up to a local cricket tournament on fifteenth august two thousand and twenty three and honestly I felt weaker maybe I did not do it right

unnormalised: Also, how important is nutrition alongside these regimens? My mom keeps telling me to eat my ghee and chapatis, but I’m not sure if it’s the best fuel for optimal performance. I once tried a purely vegetarian diet for a month leading up to a local cricket tournament on 15/08/2023 and honestly, I felt weaker. Maybe I didn't do it right.
normalised: i am training for a cycling competition to be held at Anna University campus in Chennai on twenty sixth january two thousand and twenty five and need some guidance I need a rigorous plan by tenth january two thousand and twenty five

unnormalised: I am training for a cycling competition to be held at Anna University campus in Chennai on 26/01/2025 and need some guidance. I need a rigorous plan by 10/01/2025.
normalised: any advice or personal experiences you can share would be greatly appreciated let us learn from each other

unnormalised: Any advice or personal experiences you can share would be greatly appreciated! Let’s learn from each other!
